Received(uint256).details: Event emitted when pool contract receives ETH.

cancelProposal(uint256).details: Cancel proposal, callable only by Service

getBallot(address,uint256).details: Return voting result for a given account and proposal

isDAO().details: Return if pool had a successful governance TGE

pause().details: Pause pool and corresponding TGEs and Tokens

params.asset: Asset to transfer (address(0) for ETH transfers)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Pause pool and corresponding TGEs and Tokens

GovernanceSettingsSet(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Event emitted when governance settings are set

decisionThreshold().notice: Threshold of for votes required for proposal to succeed

proposalThreshold().notice: Threshold of votes required to propose

quorumThreshold().notice: Threshold of votes required to reach quorum

transferValueForDelay().notice: Minimal transfer value to trigger delay
